QuestData.Title: Nature's Call
QuestData.Description: What vile power is this?!$b$bA curse with the strength to paralyze a demigod? Unimaginable!$b$bQuickly, $n, you must gather the archdruids of the forest. With their help, we can summon Ysera. She will surely know what horror has overtaken my mentor.$b$bI will remain here and lend Cenarius what aid I can.$b$bReturn to Lorlathil and speak with Aranelle. She will know the archdruids' whereabouts.$b$bAnd please, friend, make haste...
QuestData.RewardText: Cenarius is in need? Lord of the Forest, we shall not fail you...
